column1: to  an  abuse  of  power.  The  contention  of  the  Petitioners  was  that  the  ground
situation  which  prevailed  as  at  17th  and  18th  July  2022  did  not  warrant  the
impugned  course  of  action  adopted  by  the  Acting  President.  The  Respondents
sought to justify the impugned actions on the basis of the power conferred on the
President  by  sections  2  and  5  of  the  Public  Security  Ordinance  and  the  ground
